sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"坦率，诚实"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: frank, open, plain, blunt, honest, sincere, straightforward
means: frank ： 强调毫无保留地畅所欲言，不受任何约束。
open ： 指不隐瞒自己的秘密，愿意向他人表露自己或公开暴露自己的缺点。
plain ： 指直言不讳，毫不做作或故弄玄虚。
blunt ： 指讲话坦白直率、不客气，但隐含不得体、不顾及他人感情等意味。
honest ： 指遵守正直等道德准则。
sincere ： 侧重指一个人出自内心地对某人某事表示一种诚意。
straightforward ： 多用于答复、叙述等场合。指直截了当，不回避，或故弄玄虚。

sentence.Network_en: I got this phone call from a gentleman, who seemed sincere enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个电话是一位绅士打来的，他似乎非常诚恳。

sentence.Network_en: Sincere performances and gritty Boston settings add to the film's realism.
sentence.Network_cn: 真诚的表演和对波士顿这一背景城市的真实刻画增添了电影的现实主义色彩。

sentence.Network_en: All the well-meant, sincere advice is largely wasted on him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对所有善意、真挚的建议基本都无动于衷。

卡内基特别强调“诚实(honest)”和”真挚(sincere)”两种态度。不要将赞美当作是讨好别人的工具。

list.abs: 为您奉... ... 07.All long they 友谊天长地久（美国） 08.Sincere love 真诚的爱（美国） 09.Lonely sheepherder 孤独的牧羊人（美国）.
I sincerely wish you happiness , cheerfulness and success ., 我衷心的祝愿你幸福 , 欢乐 , 顺利.
I sincerely hope that this first transaction ., 我真诚地希望这次交易.
这个英语写作谁会啊急用啊 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... A pleasant journey to you! 旅途愉快您！ Yours sincerely, 此致， Lily 百合.
Mary and Max 《玛丽和马克思》全部台词 ... proper: 正确的 Yours sincerely: 谨启（用于英文信件署名前） unsettled: 动乱不定.
英文翻译_百度知道 ... Best regards! 祝好!(一般是信结尾时用) Yours sincerely 你真诚的(也是用于信尾) Celina 西莉娜(人名).

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (also in the sense 'not falsified, unadulterated'): from Latin sincerus 'clean, pure'

entry.def: If you say that someone is sincere, you approve of them because they really mean the things they say. You can also describe someone's behaviour and beliefs as sincere .

example.ex: He accepted her apologies as sincere...
example.tran: 他接受了她真诚的道歉。

sentences.sentence: "he was a good man, decent and sincere"
"felt sincere regret that they were leaving"

means.word_mean: 2. characterized by a firm and humorless belief in the validity of your opinions;

sentences.sentence: "both sides were deeply in earnest, even passionate"
"a film with a solemn social message"

means.word_mean: (指感情或行为)真实的; 诚挚的

sentences.en: He offered a sincere apology for his behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他主动对自己的行为诚恳地道了歉。
他的歉意是出自内心的。

sentences.en: His mother is a sincere Christian.
sentences.cn: 他母亲是个虔诚的基督教徒。

sentences.en: She is sincere in her political beliefs.
sentences.cn: 她忠实于自己的政治信仰。
